title: Maintenance on OCE on the 18/12/2014 causing update fails
body:
[FIXED] 

After the recent maintenance my league client is failing to update, i have already tried to delete the downloads and solution folder from Riot Games/League of Legends/ RADS and it still has not fixed the problem.

Any help would be appreciated thank you

replies.body:
I have the same problem . My windows 8.1 hasnt made a update . Nothing changed except of that My LeagueofLegends dont work anymore .
This is what i get when i try to start the game .
Yeh, I haven't changed anything and it still doesn't work {{champion:32}}
